get.description: Search list of events relate to user actions triggered by `logger.account` or a record in the `AccountEvents` model.
Generates a QR and a secret that can be used by the user to register an authenticator.

put.description: Attach a TOTP secret to a user for use with MFA during login.

delete.description: Revoke registered secret so a user can register a new one. It is possible to register and overwrite an existing mfa secret.

get.description: Returns the available profile data for the currently logged in user.

patch.description: Update the currently logged in account's profile.

get.description: Returns the available security data for the currently logged in user.
Returns the available sessions related to the currently logged in user.

delete.description: Revoke a session related to the currently logged in user.

get.description: Settings related to the currently logged in user.

patch.description: Update the currently logged in account's settings.

post.description: Update the currently logged in account's password.
